== April 2, 2008 ==

== Summary ==

* Hardy Heron release parties
   - So far we will be having parties in Columbus and Lima.
   
   - Parties to be held on Saturday, April 26 at 5:00 p.m.

   - We are going to try to have live video streaming to link the parties.
   
   - Additional information at https://wiki.ubuntu.com/OhioTeam/HardyParties

* Ubucon planning

   - We decided to save the Canonical CDs for Ubucon.  Burned CDs will be available at the parties.

* As usual, various other topics :-)
